Sentencas: We used the sol-gel method to deposit zirconia films doped with Sc2O3 and Al2O3 on alumina substrates.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method

Sentencas: We investigated the annealing temperature dependence of the ionic conductivity and morphology in the films whose composition was 0.85ZrO(2)-0.11Sc(2)O(3)-0.04Al(2)O(3).
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method

Sentencas: The film thickness was controlled from about 0.1 to 1.0 microns by controlling the coating time.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method

Sentencas: The films prepared by this method are stabilized in the cubic phase.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method

Sentencas: Annealing at 1200 degrees C produces isotropic and well-sintered films.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the annealed film was 7.6 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method

Sentencas: S/cm at 800 degrees C, which is comparable to that of bulk samples prepared by solid reaction at 1620 degrees C.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity and morphology in Sc2O3 and Al2O3 doped ZrO2 films prepared by the sol-gel method
